attributes.action: reverse the price differential between diesel and petrol road fuel- longstanding uk anomaly
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: most if not all EU  countries have lower prices for diesel than petrol. this is correct as diesel is less highly refined than petrol and should be cheaper.this is a longstanding anomaly in "rip-off britain" this is caused by taxation rather than oil price
